markDown.title: Checkboxes
markDown.subtitle: What-wha-what-what-what's it all about?
markDown.content:
## What are checkboxes?

Checkboxes are selection controls that allow the user to make multiple selections from a list of options. Unlike some other selection controls, checkboxes display all of the options, so the user has a chance to see all options before and while making their selections. They most commonly appear in forms, but sometimes they appear in other places in our products.

## Types of checkboxes

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-6">

#### Standard

These are the most common checkboxes. They allow the user to make selections and easily move on to the next task.

[More details](#standard-checkboxes)

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-6">

#### Gallery

These checkboxes often feature an icon, and are generally used when they control the only selection the user can make on that page.
[More details](#gallery-checkboxes)

</GridCol>

</Grid>

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-6">

![Image of a standard checkbox](/images/components/checkboxes/standard-checkbox.svg)

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-6">

![Image of a gallery checkbox](/images/components/checkboxes/gallery-checkbox.svg)

</GridCol>

</Grid>

<hr>

## Standard checkboxes

### Overview

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-4">

Standard checkboxes are the most common checkboxes. They allow the user to make their selections and move on to the next task.

##### Best practices:

- Use when the number of options is easy for the user to process, generally fewer than 10.
- Unless you want to emphasize the selection, these are usually the checkboxes you should use.

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-8"></GridCol>

![Image of a standard checkbox's specs with all values in pixels](/images/components/checkboxes/standard-checkbox-specs.svg)

All values are in pixels.

</GridCol>

</Grid>

### States

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-4">

##### Active

- Selected: product color (typically 500 level)
- Unselected: ZUI Gray 500

##### Hover

- Selected: product color (typically 400 level)
- Unselected: ZUI Gray 600

##### Disabled

- Selected: ZUI Gray 300
- Unselected: ZUI Gray 200

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-8">

![Image of a gallery checkbox's different states: active, hover, and disabled](/images/components/checkboxes/standard-checkbox-states.svg)

</GridCol>

</Grid>

<hr>

## Gallery checkboxes

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-4">

### Overview

Gallery checkboxes are more prominent than standard checkboxes. They are generally used when they control the only selection the user can make on that page.

##### Best practices:

- Because they're so large, they should generally be reserved for when that selection is the only one the user can make on that page.
- Icons both emphasize the selection and reinforce the contrast between the options.

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-8">

![Image of gallery checkbox's specs](/images/components/checkboxes/gallery-checkbox-specs.svg)

All values are in pixels.

</GridCol>

</Grid>

### States

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-4">

#### Gray Background

##### Unselected

- Background color: White
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600
- Dropshadow
  - Color: Black at 16%
  - X-Axis: 0px
  - Y-Axis: 1px
  - Blur radius: 3px
  - Spread radius: 0px

##### Hover

- Background color: #FAFAFA
- Checkbox color: ZUI Gray 300
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600
- Dropshadow
  - Color: Black at 16%
  - X-Axis: 0px
  - Y-Axis: 3px
  - Blur radius: 6px
  - Spread radius: 0px

##### Selected

- Border color: product color (typically 500 level)
- Background color: product color (typically 50 level)
- Checkbox color: product color (typically 500 level)
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600

##### Disabled

- Background color: ZUI Gray 100
- Illustration opacity: 50%
- Font color: ZUI Gray 300
- Font weight: 600

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-8">

![Image of gallery checkboxes with different states on a gray background: unselected, hover, selected, and disabled](/images/components/checkboxes/gallery-checkbox-states-gray.svg)

Gallery checkboxes on a gray background.

</GridCol>

</Grid>

<Grid>

<GridCol col="span-4">

#### White Background

##### Unselected

- Border color: ZUI Gray 300
- Background color: White
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600

##### Hover

- Border color: ZUI Gray 300
- Background color: #FAFAFA
- Checkbox color: ZUI Gray 300
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600

##### Selected

- Border color: product color (typically 500 level)
- Background color: product color (typically 50 level)
- Checkbox color: product color (typically 500 level)
- Font color: ZUI Gray 800
- Font weight: 600

##### Disabled

- Background color: ZUI Gray 100
- Illustration opacity: 50%
- Font color: ZUI Gray 300
- Font weight: 600

</GridCol>

<GridCol col="span-8">

![Image of gallery checkboxes with different states on a white background: unselected, hover, selected, and disabled](/images/components/checkboxes/gallery-checkbox-states-white.svg)

Gallery checkboxes on a white background.

</GridCol>

</Grid>
